The temperature of the air more than $1 \mathrm{~m}$ above the ground is assumed to be constant and equal to $30{ }^{\circ} \mathrm{C}$. The atmospheric pressure is assumed to be normal. The refractive index, $n$, is such that $n-1$ is proportional to the density of the air. Discuss the accuracy of your result.
